about_the_game:
Navigate through increasingly difficult obstacles to defeat the alien invasion. With two unique game modes, you'll face a variety of challenges that will push your skills to the limit. Can you master the sequences and climb to the top of the leaderboards?

Arcade Mode


In Arcade Mode, you'll face unique challenges and additional obstacles. Adapt quickly to changing patterns to succeed and climb the leaderboards as you showcase your skills.

Classic Mode


In Classic Mode, you'll face a series of progressively difficult sequences that require quick reflexes and precise timing. As you advance, the sequences become faster and more complex, introducing new obstacles and patterns to master. Stay focused and aim for a high score! Survive as long as you can and achieve the highest score possible. Compete with friends and players worldwide on the leaderboards.

name: Finger Flex

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Step into the past with your LCD handheld! Test your reflexes and coordination as you navigate challenging obstacles to defeat the alien invasion. With two unique game modes, master the sequences and climb the leaderboards. Can you rise to the challenge?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese
